ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] What resolution do you all play at?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, somehow I seemed to have missed that option, I ll have to check it tonight. As for systems, I have a PII 400, 512 mb ram, 20 gig hd @ 7200 rpm, a prophet
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, somehow I seemed to have missed that option, I'll have to check it
tonight.

As for systems, I have a PII 400, 512 mb ram, 20 gig hd @ 7200 rpm, a
prophet 3D geforce card with DDR and DVI with 32 mb ram and a smoking Sony
21" monitor. (max res is 2048 x 1536)

I still get dropped frames in some areas of kunark (especially swamp of no
hope) I think I need to upgrade my processer.

Draelon



-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2000 1:44 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] What resolution do you all play at?


i bought a second monster 3d II back in beta3 just so i could play in full
screen 1024x768, and have never played in any other res. i just turn that
display option to not switch resolutions for my inventory screens. was
lagging in this res before i got my new RoK system, but the geforce ddr-dvi
(as well as everything else being new) helped enormously.

Shada

> I was playing with different resolutions last night and I was
> wondering what
> resolution everyone plays with.
>
> I personally stick with 640 x 480 because I can't stand
> watching my monitor
> switch resolutions when I switch to inventory or tracking mode.
>
> Draelon
